description.en: Your task is to build a robot that can push a ball from your kit over the outer ring of your challenge field. How many rounds can you make under 1 minute without letting the ball go off the line?

Start driving from the yellow square.
Do not let the ball get off the line.
Time limit : 1 minute
You have got 3 trials.

You made 1 round. = Good job! Let's try again.
You made 2 rounds. = Wow! Excellent job! Another try?
You made 3 rounds. = You are such a pro!
Bonus task: Can you do the same by programming your robot?

Let's count your points.
You made 1 round. = 5 points
You made 2 rounds. = 10 points
You made 3 rounds. = 15 points
We would love to see your scores.
